translations: （凌乱的）一堆；许多，大量；<非正式>破旧的汽车，老爷车
堆积，堆放；对……大加赞扬（或指责等）
【名】 （Heap）（英）希普，（芬）海亚普，（东南亚国家华语）协（人名）

sentences.sentence: His clothes lay in a heap on the floor.
She piled the papers in a heap on her desk, just anyhow.
sentences.translation: 她把文件在桌上随便搁成一堆。

sentences.sentence: They had jumbled it all up into a heap.
sentences.translation: 他们已把这些都混在一起堆成一大堆。
